example.eg: Simon was concerned about Maria driving home after drinking a bottle of wine and did his best to discourage her.
example.egtrans: 玛利亚喝了一瓶红酒，要开车回家，西蒙很担心，尽力劝阻她。

example.eg: Jane did her best to discourage her friend from drinking too much.
example.egtrans: 珍尽全力劝阻自己的朋友，不要喝太多酒。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 劝阻...不要做..., 阻止...做..

example.eg: Don't tell him he's not as fast as his brother; you'll discourage him.
example.egtrans: 不要对他说，他不如自己哥哥快，你会让他沮丧的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使沮丧, 使灰心丧气
